snippet: The sheer number of officers involved in a kickback scheme at the Baltimore Police Department stunned department veterans and civilians alike.
abstract: Sheer number of Baltimore police officers involved in a kickback scheme at an automobile body repair shop stuns department veterans and civilians alike; in the aftermath, Commissioner Frederick H Bealefeld III brings in Grayling G Williams, formerly of the Department of Homeland Security, to head the division charged with rooting out corruption.
lead_paragraph: The sheer number of officers involved in a kickback scheme at the Baltimore Police Department stunned department veterans and civilians alike.

headline.seo: Baltimore Police Corruption Case Tests Commissioner
headline.main: Baltimore Police Scandal Spotlights Leader’s Fight to Root Out Corruption
headline.print_headline: Baltimore Police Scandal Spotlights Leader’s Fight To Root Out Corruption
